item.title: Persona 3 Reload Is at Its Best-Ever Price at Amazon for Black Friday
item.content:encoded:
https://www.ign.com/articles/persona-3-reload-black-friday-2024

Join SEES for $25.

Amazon has no shortage of good deals in its Black Friday Sale Week. Some of the standoud gaming sales include Alan Wake 2's Deluxe Edition (that's two DLCs!) for $49.99, Dragon's Dogma 2 for $40, and the Final Fantasy Anniversary Collection (I-VI) for $55.

Yet another one of its unmissable deals on newer games is on Persona 3 Reload, currently selling for just $25 – that's a $45 price drop. (Atlus's other game from this year, the excellent Metaphor: ReFantazio, is also getting $20 knocked off its price for Black Friday.) It's on sale at Walmart, too, but the deal isn't as good at $40, although Target is price-matching Amazon for the PS5 version only.

This rebooted remake of Atlus's Persona 3, easily the darkest thematically of the Persona games, came out in February and this is by far the lowest price it's sold for since release. When I previewed the game back in January, I was creeped out by the new Tartarus (positive reaction) and delighted by the upgrades made from the original Persona 3, another game I love dearly. Of course, it was even better to experience it as a whole in a full playthrough. Atlus stays not missing!

Persona 3 Reload

When Is Black Friday 2024?

We’re in the home stretch: Black Friday falls on November 29 this year. All month long, retailers have been rolling out sales, ramping up to massive discounts on Black Friday and through the weekend into Cyber Monday. There are already some fantastic deals available on PS5 consoles (including PS VR2) and controllers, video games for all platforms, AirPods Pro, and tons more.

Leanne Butkovic (she/they) is an Editorial Project Manager at IGN, where they've also written about movies, TV, and games.

item.title: Pokémon Trading Cards Striker Tins Get Huge Discount in Walmart's Black Friday Sale
item.content:encoded:
https://www.ign.com/articles/pokemon-tcg-tins-walmart-black-friday-sale-2024

Double the power, half the price.

Calling all Pokémon Trainers and collectors: Walmart's Black Friday sale (Nov. 25: live at 12pm ET for Walmart+ members, and 5pm ET for everyone) has two Pokémon TCG V Strikers Tins on a budget-friendly price drop. At just $15 each (regularly $24.99), these tins are the perfect way to bulk up your collection without emptying your wallet.

Each tin offers a standout foil card of either Tyranitar V or Empoleon V, five Chilling Reign booster packs, and a Pokémon TCG Online game code card. Whether you're in it for the powerful cards, the thrill of opening boosters, or snag some of the best cards from the Chilling Reign set, this deal delivers in spades.

Pokemon Trading Card Games V Strikers Tin Tyranitar V

Pokemon Trading Card Games V Strikers Tin Tyranitar V

Tyranitar V brings raw power to the table, making it a formidable addition to any deck. This tin is packed with five Chilling Reign booster packs, where you could score gems like the Secret Rare Snorlax, Alternate Full Art Galarian Moltres V, or the Secret Art Blaziken VMAX. Tyranitar V’s sturdy presence and devastating moves make it an excellent anchor for battle strategies, and the collectible tin is a bonus for any fan of this powerhouse Pokémon.

Pokemon Trading Card Games V Strikers Tin Empoleon V

Pokemon Trading Card Games V Strikers Tin Empoleon V

Empoleon V is all about strategy and grace under pressure. This tin includes five Chilling Reign booster packs, allowing you to pull game-changing cards like the Galarian Moltres V or Blaziken VMAX.

Empoleon V’s ability to manipulate your opponent’s setup adds a tactical edge to your gameplay, making it a must-have for competitive players. Plus, the sleek tin design is ideal for storing your growing collection.

Get 50% off Annual Walmart+ membership

Get 50% off annual Walmart+ membership!

Hit the Walmart Black Friday sales for half off this time around, then enjoy the benefits of the membership until next Black Friday. It's a no-brainer for us, especially if you want to get a head start on these Pokémon TCG tins!

The Chilling Reign set is loaded with sought-after cards, including:

  • Secret Rare Snorlax: A tanky Pokémon that can replenish your hand while dishing out powerful moves.
  • Galarian Moltres V (Alternate Full Art): With stunning artwork and a strong Darkness-type ability, this card is a prized addition to any deck.
  • Blaziken VMAX (Alternate Art Secret): Its Max Blaze attack energizes your Rapid Strike Pokémon, making it a strategic powerhouse.

Best Nintendo Switch Game Black Friday Deals

There are plenty of Nintendo Switch digital game deals to consider when picking up a console. The current best offers include Persona 5 Royal for $14.99 , alongside new games like Sonic x Shadow Generations for $37.49 or last years GOTY contender The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom for $49.99, and plenty more. Have a look over our top picks in the sale, or take up the challenge yourself and have a gander over the many, many discounts found at Best Buy right now.

When Is Black Friday 2024?

We’re in the home stretch: Black Friday falls on November 29 this year. All month long, retailers have been rolling out sales, ramping up to massive discounts on Black Friday and through the weekend into Cyber Monday. We already know what PlayStation and Xbox have in store, and most general deals will be available well in advance, such as this excellent discount on DualSense controllers.
